## Bug Description
A clear description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Run command '...'
2. With these options '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

## Environment
- OS: [e.g., Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 13]
- ffmpeg version: [e.g., 4.4.2]
- File type: [AAX or AAXC]
- Command used: [full command line]
